title: 22.Dec. 63
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Julius Bissier [1893-1965], Ascona, Switzerland; Lefebre Gallery, New York, NY, until December 1964 [1]; acquired by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 90f in "The 1964 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1964 - January 1965. It was lent by Lefebre Gallery, New York, NY.
[2]. The painting was acquired by Carnegie Institute from the 1964 International as a gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA. Payment to Lefebre Gallery was sent on December 9, 1964. The painting was accessioned the following year, on May 11, 1965.

creator.birth_place: Freiburg im Breisgau (Freiburg district, Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg, Germany)
